News.Title: Jumbo Finance Board Meeting Set for Feb 12, 2026
News.Summary: Jumbo Finance Limited announces board meeting scheduled for February 12, 2026 at 4:00 PM to consider Q3FY26 unaudited financial results for quarter ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: CORDS Cable Industries Board Meet on Feb 13, 2026
News.Summary: CORDS Cable Industries Ltd schedules 217th Board meeting for February 13, 2026 to consider Q3FY26 unaudited financial results. Trading window closed from January 1, 2026.

News.Title: CORDS Cable Files GST Order Disclosure with Delay
News.Summary: CORDS Cable Industries Limited files regulatory disclosure regarding GST Order dated December 31, 2025, with explanation for delayed submission to stock exchange.

News.Title: Cords Cable Gets ₹12.46L GST Demand Notice
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries receives GST demand order of ₹12.46 lakh with penalty and interest from Rajasthan tax authorities for incorrect input tax credit availment in FY 2018-19.

News.Title: Cords Cable Gets ₹35.59L CGST Demand Order
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries receives CGST demand order of ₹35.59 lakh plus penalty for input tax credit disallowance covering FY2018-19 to FY2022-23. Company plans rectification application.

News.Title: Cords Cable Industries Receives Rs 38.26 Lakh GST Demand Order for Input Tax Credit Disallowance
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries received a GST demand order of Rs 38,26,180 along with equivalent penalty from CGST Division-Tijara for incorrect input tax credit availment related to purchases from FY 2018-19 to 2019-20. The company plans to file an appeal against the order and states there is no material impact on its financial, operational or other activities.

News.Title: Cords Cable Industries Receives GST Penalty Reduction from Rs. 1.05 Crore to Rs. 50,000
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries received a rectification order reducing penalty on Managing Director and Whole Time Director from Rs. 1,05,87,295 to Rs. 50,000 under CGST Act provisions related to disallowed input tax credit for FY 2018-19 to 2020-21. The company had deposited Rs. 1,76,55,460 under protest and plans to file an appeal against the original order, stating no material impact on financial or operational activities.

News.Title: Cords Cable Industries Receives GST Demand Order Worth Rs 1.06 Crore
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries Limited received a GST demand order from the Assistant Commissioner, CGST Division-Tijara, Alwar for Rs 1,05,87,295 under sections 74(9) of the CGST Act, 2017. The demand relates to incorrect availment of input tax credit for purchases during F.Y. 2018-19 to 2020-21. The order includes penalty of equivalent amount under sections 74(1) and 122(1)(vii) along with applicable interest. Additional penalty under section 122(3)(a) has been imposed on the Managing Director and Whole Time Director. The company has deposited Rs 1,76,55,460 under protest towards the demand, interest, and penalty. The company intends to file an appeal against the order with Appellate Authorities and states there is no material impact on financial, operations or other activities.

News.Title: Cords Cable Industries Reports Financial Results for Quarter Ended September 30, 2025
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries Limited announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025. The company reported a net loss of ₹357.92 lakhs for the quarter compared to a loss of ₹262.78 lakhs in the same quarter last year. For the half-year period, the net loss was ₹744.52 lakhs versus ₹550.34 lakhs in the previous year. Revenue from operations for the quarter was ₹24,570.06 lakhs compared to ₹25,847.58 lakhs in the corresponding quarter of the previous year. The company's total expenses for the quarter were ₹25,051.59 lakhs. Cash and cash equivalents stood at ₹25.56 lakhs as of September 30, 2025. The Board of Directors approved these results in their meeting held on November 12, 2025. The company operates in a single business segment and has no subsidiary, associate, or joint venture companies.

News.Title: Cords Cable Industries Receives GST Demand Order of Rs 3.79 Crore
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries Limited received a GST demand order from Additional Commissioner, CGST Alwar, Commissionerate for Rs 3,78,77,347 under sections 74 of CGST Act, 2017 and corresponding provisions of SGST Act, 2017 and IGST Act 2017. The demand includes penalty and applicable interest for incorrect availment of input tax credit. The authority disallowed input tax credit on purchases utilized during FY 2018-19 and FY 2019-20. The company states there is no material impact on financial, operations or other activities and intends to file an appeal against the order with the Appellate Authorities.

News.Title: Cords Cable Industries Approves Q1 2025 Results, Sets AGM Date and Appoints New Independent Director
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries Limited's Board approved unaudited financial results for Q1 2025 ended June 30, 2025. The company reported revenue from operations of Rs 2,256.73 lakhs compared to Rs 1,729.48 lakhs in the same quarter last year. Net profit increased to Rs 386.61 lakhs from Rs 267.58 lakhs year-over-year. Earnings per share stood at Rs 2.97. The Board scheduled the 34th Annual General Meeting for September 29, 2025, at 12:00 noon in New Delhi. Book closure period is set from September 23-29, 2025, with record date of September 22, 2025, for dividend payment purposes. The company appointed Shri Praveen Verma as Non-Executive Independent Director for a five-year term from October 1, 2025, to September 30, 2030. Remote e-voting facility will be available from September 26-28, 2025. The company operates in a single business segment and has no subsidiary, associate, or joint venture companies.

News.Title: Cords Cable Industries Approves Q1 2025 Results, Sets AGM Date and Appoints New Independent Director
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries Ltd's Board approved unaudited financial results for Q1 2025 ended June 30, 2025, showing revenue from operations of Rs 2,256.73 lakhs compared to Rs 1,729.48 lakhs in the same quarter last year. The company reported a profit of Rs 386.61 lakhs for the quarter with earnings per share of Rs 2.97. The Board scheduled the 34th Annual General Meeting for September 29, 2025, at 12:00 noon in New Delhi. Book closure period is set from September 23-29, 2025, with record date of September 22, 2025, for dividend payment purposes. The company will provide remote e-voting facility from September 26-28, 2025. The Board also approved the appointment of Shri Praveen Verma as Non-Executive Independent Director for a five-year term from October 1, 2025, to September 30, 2030, following the expiration of the previous director's term.

News.Title: Cords Cable Industries Reports Improved Q2 EBITDA and Margin
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries has reported its Q2 financial results. The company's EBITDA increased to 114 million rupees, up from 89 million rupees in the same quarter last year. The EBITDA margin also improved slightly to 6.24% from 6.12% year-over-year.

News.Title: Cords Cable Industries Reports Q2 FY2024 Financial Results
News.Summary: Cords Cable Industries has announced its financial results for the second quarter. The company's net profit increased to 26 million rupees from 20 million rupees in the same quarter last year. Revenue also saw growth, rising to 1.8 billion rupees from 1.4 billion rupees year-over-year.
